alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:33PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Westchester and Putnam Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fishkill to near Mahopac to Tarrytown. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ossining, Peekskill, Mount Kisco, Mahopac, Lake Carmel, Cold Spring, Carmel, Yorktown Heights, Fahnestock State Park, Jefferson Valley, Putnam Valley, Croton-on-Hudson and Buchanan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
